name: Electric Eels
flavor: A swarm of eels that encircle and electrocute.

features.name: Horde (2d4+1) - Passive
features.desc: When the Eels have marked half or more of their HP, their standard attack deals 2d4+1 physical damage instead.

features.name: Paralyzing Shock - Action
features.desc: Mark a Stress to make a standard attack against all targets within Very Close range. You gain a Fear for each target that marks HP.
